addressToBidIds.details: The mapping between bidders address and array of the bids made from that address

bids.details: The array of all bids ever made

bidsCount.details: The count of all bids made

surTokenIdHasBids.details: The mapping between advertisement surface token id and bool that indicates if there are any bid for that token

surTokenIdToActiveBidIds.details: The mapping between advertisement surface token id and array of active the bids made for that surface

surTokenIdToBidIds.details: The mapping between advertisement surface token id and array of the bids made for that surface

LogActive(uint256,address,uint256).notice: The event emitted when new highest bid is added

LogFinished(uint256,address,uint256).notice: The event emitted when bid is finished, advertisement has been executed and ERC721 has been paid

LogOutbid(uint256,address,uint256).notice: The event emitted when bid is outbid by another bid

collectBid(uint256).notice: Collects payment from bid in when advertisement has been already shown

constructor.notice: The constructor of advertisement surface auction contract

getActiveBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets active bid id and bid structure for advertisement surface id and index

getActiveBidCount(uint256).notice: Get active bid count. The active bid is winning bid.

getBid(uint256).notice: Gets bid structure for given bid id

getBidCount().notice: Gets the number of bids in the contract

getBidWorth((address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Calculates how much the bid is worth. It's required to decide which bid outbids the other bid.

getMyBid(uint256).notice: Gets bid id and bid structure for given index od msg sender bids

getMyBidsCount().notice: Gets the number of the bids made by msg sender

getSurfaceBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets bid id and bid structure for advertisement surface id and index

getSurfaceBidCount(uint256).notice: Gets the number of bids for given advertisement surface

newBid((address,uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Creates new bid for advertisement surface

refundBid(uint256).notice: Refunds bid in case this bid has been outbid by someone else

userdoc.notice: The contract used to auctioning advertisement on advertisement surfaces
